quote: Love all, but trust a few.
Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.
Do every act of your life as if it were your last.
Always forgive your enemies - nothing annoys them so much.
A kiss may ruin a human life.
Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
The difference between a boss and a leader: a boss says, 'Go!' - a leader says, 'Let's go!'
Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.
Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
A man can be happy with any woman, as long as he does not love her.
Everything in life that we really accept undergoes a change. So suffering must become Love. That is the mystery.
Dreams show you that you have the power...
Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
Love all, but trust a few.
Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.
Do every act of your life as if it were your last.
Always forgive your enemies - nothing annoys them so much.
A kiss may ruin a human life.
Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
The difference between a boss and a leader: a boss says, 'Go!' - a leader says, 'Let's go!'
Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.
Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
A man can be happy with any woman, as long as he does not love her.
Everything in life that we really accept undergoes a change. So suffering must become Love. That is the mystery.
Dreams show you that you have the power...
Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
Attention to health is life greatest hindrance.
Darkness can not drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
A fool's bolt is soon shot
Everyone admits that love is wonderful and necessary, yet no one agrees on just what it is.
A character is a completely fashioned will.
A man may learn wisdom even from a foe.
Choose your love, Love your choice.
Before your dreams can come true, you have to have those dreams.
A signature always reveals a man's character - and sometimes even his name.
If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
Adopt the pace of nature; her secret is patience.
A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict.
A man of my spiritual intensity does not eat corpses.
A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money.
Confusion now hath made his masterpiece!
Everyone is a genius at least once a year; a real genius has his original ideas closer together.
Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
A human being's first responsibility is to shake hands with himself.
A ship in harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are built for.
Character builds slowly, but it can be torn down with incredible swiftness.
A day for toil, an hour for sport, but for a friend is life too short.
Tis sometimes the height of wisdom to feign stupidity.
An angry man opens his mouth and shuts his eyes.
Life is something you do when you can't get to sleep.
Action, looks, words, steps, form the alphabet by which you may spell character.
For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
The only way of knowing a person is to love them without hope.
Do not write so that you can be understood, write so that you cannot be misunderstood.
Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship.
Love is a conflict between reflexes and reflections.
Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
How use doth breed a habit in man!
A true friend is one soul in two bodies.
A pessimist is a man who thinks everybody is as nasty as himself.
Experience increases our wisdom but doesn't reduce our follies.
We live in the world when we love it.
A man's dreams are an index to his greatness.
God made him, and therefore let him pass for a man.
A man's life is what his thoughts make of it.
A prudent question is one-half of wisdom.
Character is power; it makes friends, draws patronage and support and opens the way to wealth, honor and happiness.
Our truest life is when we are in our dreams awake.
A dream is a scripture, and many scriptures are nothing but dreams.
Action is eloquence.
Man proposes, woman forecloses.
'Tis a superstition to insist on a special diet. All is made at last of the same chemical atoms.
A man's own character is the arbiter of his fortune.
Sex alleviates tension. Love causes it.
Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself
Education is an ornament in prosperity and a refuge in adversity.
Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.
Friendship is essentially a partnership.
Men's second childhood begins when a woman gets a hold of him.
Can there be a love which does not make demands on its object?
A good idea plus capable men cannot fail; it is better than money in the bank.
I don't want to make money. I just want to be wonderful.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
An ounce of emotion is equal to a ton of facts.
A woman's friendship ever ends in love.
Education is the best provision for old age.
Big thinking precedes great achievement.
A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
